sn45.62:0.3: Accomplishment in Rational Application of Mind (2nd)
sn45.62:1.1: “… accomplishment in rational application of mind.
sn45.62:1.2: A mendicant accomplished in rational application of mind can expect to develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path.
sn45.62:1.3: And how does a mendicant accomplished in rational application of mind develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path?
sn45.62:1.4: It’s when a mendicant develops right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion, which culminate in the removal of greed, hate, and delusion.
sn45.62:1.5: That’s how a mendicant accomplished in rational application of mind develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path.”
